channel.title: [Alch Rework] [Stoneskin]
channel.description:
So the new neutral class announcement got me thinking of a way to increase the skill floor of alchemists.
>**Stoneskin** (**D**) You start with 0 stoneskins. You gain 1 stoneskin everytime you successfully kill **or heal someone that is attacked** Max 3 stoneskins
I would also recommend giving Alchemist an extra yolo bomb and/or changing the amount of stoneskins avaliable.

item.description:
The most common reply post-pretender announcement is to rework the inquisitor’s kill to work like the pretender’s. Ie it must investigate the target works. I believe sorc/inq will still need further changes as sorc being able to bastardise the sorcerer’s check makes the inquisitor far too slow; inquisitor could almost be considered BD.

item.title: [Alch Rework] [Stoneskin]
item.dc:creator: Marcus_Doodalee
item.description:
I’m sort of on the fence for whether alchemist should start with a stoneskin or not. Limiting his heals or reworking stoneskin to be a combined mechanic with emerald potion is also an idea, alchemist has death immunity if and when he decides to bomb. Rework stoneskins as a reward for healing attacks.

Note that the Alchemist does not gain stoneskins for healing bleeding or poison.
